Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
      • Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Shape
    The Rectangle class is a class used to save the following attributes needed to draw a Rectangle in the graphic user interface (GUI).
    Author:
    JonathanNeff

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Rectangle​(int sx, int sy, int w, int h)
      The class overload constructor Rectangle generates an instance of a Rectangle, designated by a point in the xy plane of the JPanel drawingPanel, and the width and height.
      Rectangle​(int sx, int sy, int w, int h, java.lang.String color)
      The class constructor Rectangle generates an instance of a Rectangle, designated by a point in the xy plane of the JPanel drawingPanel, and the width, height and designated Color.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean contains​(int x, int y)  
      void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g1)
      The draw method draws an instance of the Rectangle, in the GUI with the designated Color.
      int getHeight​()
      The getHeight method returns the height of a Rectangle object.
      java.lang.String getType​()
      The getType method returns a String identifying the Shape object, in this case a Rectangle.
      int getWidth​()
      The getWidth method returns the width of a Rectangle object.
      java.lang.String toString​()
      The toString method returns a formatted String used for saving a Rectangle's attributes to a text file, that can be reopened at a later time.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • Methods inherited from class Shape

        createColor, getColor, getStartX, getStartY, translateColor, writeColor

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle​(int sx,
                 int sy,
                 int w,
                 int h,
                 java.lang.String color)
        The class constructor Rectangle generates an instance of a Rectangle, designated by a point in the xy plane of the JPanel drawingPanel, and the width, height and designated Color.
        Parameters:
        sx - x-coordinate of start point
        sy - y-coordinate of start point
        w - width of Rectangle
        h - height of Rectangle
        color - Color of Rectangle object
